newsitem.title: HUNGARY: Hungary's forint ends firmer vs dlr, right on bid.
newsitem.headline: Hungary's forint ends firmer vs dlr, right on bid.

text.p: The Hungarian forint closed a little firmer against the dollar and steady against the central bank's currency basket as it maintained its position right on the resistance level, dealers said on Wednesday.
The forint ended at 184.28.33 to the dollar, compared to 184.63/68 at midday, as the dollar/mark eased on European markets.
The forint floats against a currency basket made up 30 percent of the dollar and 70 percent of the mark.

"Any (forex) buying interest has centred around today's movements of the dollar/mark," said Noemi Koppendorfer of ABN-AMRO Magyar Bank, formerly Magyar Hitel Bank. "There are no other factors at the moment."
